segments.text: Hello . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'm here to get my salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Do you have your Current All-in-one Passbook with you ? I'll need your password for this transaction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And how much of your salary would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think just 3,000 RIB will be enough .
segments.speaker: S2
